body_html: Why don't we put each function in a separate html page just like numpy/scipy (or even tensorflow) does instead of listing everything in a single page? Instead of spending time on optimizing the equations this could be a much better alternative. I guess, most people visit the docs page only to check out one or two functions.

body: Why don't we put each function in a separate html page just like numpy/scipy (or even tensorflow) does instead of listing everything in a single page? Instead of spending time on optimizing the equations this could be a much better alternative. I guess, most people visit the docs page only to check out one or two functions.
